about_the_game:
Allows you to use Ace and equip him with the following items.
- Akademeia Winter Uniform I (Appearance)
- Akademeia Winter Uniform II (Appearance)
- Akademeia Winter Uniform III (Appearance)
- Deck of Cards (Weapon)
- Akademeia Cards (Weapon)
- Reaper's Tarot (Weapon)
- Special Chat Messages

*You must first download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.
* This content is included in DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Deluxe Edition and Standard Edition, available to purchase seperately
detailed_description:
Allows you to use Ace and equip him with the following items.
- Akademeia Winter Uniform I (Appearance)
- Akademeia Winter Uniform II (Appearance)
- Akademeia Winter Uniform III (Appearance)
- Deck of Cards (Weapon)
- Akademeia Cards (Weapon)
- Reaper's Tarot (Weapon)
- Special Chat Messages

*You must first download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
